name: I am out, The Game
description:
I made this game for Weekly game Jam, and it was a fun experience. 

I always wanted to experiment with different spawn objects approaches.

I also wanted to made terrain curved, but i did not know how to approach the problem, and due to having not enough ideas about at and lack of time i decided to do it later in some other project. 

Also, I put myself in the game as some kinda of monster that runs from you, so, dont spend to much time staying still. 

I still confused why 0 is -0, but i seem to not be able to fix it. 

if you have any suggestions and something to criticize, i would appreciate your comments, thank you, have a nice day <3 :D
